analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/4/0xaed1248aa72050cbf72f02467ce611dea2ce0305.sol:
	Contract GCGToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/4/0xaed1248aa72050cbf72f02467ce611dea2ce0305.sol#215)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/4/0xaed1248aa72050cbf72f02467ce611dea2ce0305.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/4/0xaed1248aa72050cbf72f02467ce611dea2ce0305.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/4/0xaed1248aa72050cbf72f02467ce611dea2ce0305.sol#87) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of GCGToken.burn (/unique_chucks/4/0xaed1248aa72050cbf72f02467ce611dea2ce0305.sol#232) is not in mixedCase
